books.author: by James Patterson and Marshall Karp
books.description: Detective Zach Gordon and his partner, members of an elite task force that protects the rich and famous, pursue a cold-blooded killer.
books.name: NYPD RED 4

books.author: by Christine Feehan
books.description: Trap shares his sidekick's desire for getting even.
books.name: SPIDER GAME

books.author: by Brandon Sanderson
books.description: A sequel to "Shadows of Self"; a Mistborn novel.
books.name: THE BANDS OF MOURNING

books.author: by Nicholas Sparks
books.description: When Travis meets his new neighbor, his bachelor status erodes.
books.name: THE CHOICE

books.author: by Elizabeth Strout
books.description: A woman struggles with memories of her impoverished and disturbing childhood and its effect on the present as she attempts to reconcile with her mother.
books.name: MY NAME IS LUCY BARTON

books.author: by Danielle Steel
books.description: A woman whose life has been shattered befriends a homeless boy.
books.name: BLUE

books.author: by Kristin Hannah
books.description: Two sisters are separated in World War II France: one in the countryside, the other in Paris.
books.name: THE NIGHTINGALE

books.author: by Liane Moriarty
books.description: A family home on an Australian island is bequeathed to an outsider, and the clan's conflicts come with it.
books.name: THE LAST ANNIVERSARY

books.author: by Paula Hawkins
books.description: A psychological thriller set in the environs of London is full of complications and betrayals.
books.name: THE GIRL ON THE TRAIN

books.author: by Michael Punke
books.description: Left for dead after a mauling, a master tracker is consumed by a singular desire for revenge; an inspiration for the 2015 film.
books.name: THE REVENANT

books.author: by Eloisa James
books.description: An expat heiress in Regency England finds her affections shifting to her fiancé's twin.
books.name: MY AMERICAN DUCHESS

books.author: by Vi Keeland
books.description: After a locker-room interview of a Super Bowl M.V.P., a sportscaster decides to alter her dating rules.
books.name: THE BALLER

books.author: by Kevin Hearne
books.description: When his vampire nemesis heads to Rome, a Druid follows.
books.name: STAKED

books.author: by Andy Weir
books.description: Abandoned by his crew, an astronaut embarks on a dogged quest to stay alive.
books.name: THE MARTIAN

books.author: by Sandra Brown
books.description: The private investigator Dodge Hanley heads to Texas to save a daughter he has never met, who has become the object of a stalker’s desire.
books.name: TOUGH CUSTOMER
